channel.title: DataOps on Tracy Bannon
channel.description: Recent content in DataOps on Tracy Bannon

item.title: DOI: DataOps is not DevOps for a database
item.description: DataOps is not DevOps for a database At the DevOps Online Summint, 2021, Tracy Bannon tries to clear up some things about DataOps. In this conversation, she explains why DataOps is not DevOps for a database! In this converastion, Trac talks with Tom Henricksen about the differences and why folks get confused.
